alert.note: Alert for Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 2:56PM EST until December 05 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM SUNDAY TO 7 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Amounts up to 10 inches possible above 1500 ft. * WHERE...Much of the Adirondacks in northern new York and all of eastern Vermont, including the southern Green Mountains. * WHEN...From 1 PM Sunday to 7 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be heavy and wet, especially late Sunday into Monday morning. Scattered power outages are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex
